website_summaries.verdict: The perfect halter for overeating and obese horses, as this model also features a snug muzzle that prevents free snacking on hay or grass, but permits the horse to drink.
pros: Large air holes for easy breathing
Restricts access to grazing, but not drinking water
cons: This horse muzzle and halter combo is only available in black

customer_reviews.title: Has been just right for our compromised mare.
customer_reviews.text: Basket is large for my horses' somewhat smaller head, but it keeps her from getting hair rubbed off muzzle. Hold up well, will chew hole larger over time, but to be expected. Like the larger nostril openings, especially on hot/humid days. We use a fly mask over it to keep her from pulling it off or springing clip. Much better than the heavier weight ones and like that it doesn't have to be used with a halter. Opening is large though so you may need to consider a model with a smaller opening to eat through if you have a really lush pasture. We keep another on hand for those times of year when she needs more restriction.
customer_reviews.author: JackieA

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle works great. The holes are large enough for breathing, especially the bottom hole. It is large enough not to be completely discouraging to the horse where he doesnt bother to try. I dont like the ones with to small a hole in the bottom. This muzzle has stopped a horrible cribber which causes his gas bubble colocs and the last one, an impaction colic. So far so good! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the horse to breath and graze in
customer_reviews.text: My horse likes this on over the other as it can easier graze and breath in it due to the big holes around the nose area. UPDATE: the first one lasted okay wasn't impressed but okay. The second one lasted maybe two weeks before the muzzle part came undone from the halter part. Due to seems came undone. By mistake I bought one more just without the halter part. Since I had it put it on the horse. Lasted a bit over the week before the seems became undone. I am over with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Svejuca

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grazing muzzle. I have tried many different kinds but this is the only one that my horse cannot get off. I also like the fact that it is designed to make it easier for the horse to breathe and is lightweight. My only complaint is that the opening on the bottom of the muzzle is larger than most other muzzles. It is a rectangular shape instead of a round opening. But it still limits the intake of grass which is crucial for my Cushings/IR horse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built sturdy, rubs some
customer_reviews.text: I ended up seeing a fluffy piece of fabric to the inside where it touches my horses muzzle and under her chin because it rubbed pretty good in those two spots. I don’t have a picture unfortunately but after I put that on it was no problem! Effectively stops my horse from eating probably half of what was out there that she shouldn’t have. Just a spring time founder prevention so I don’t know the longevity of multiple seasons or years.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Working out great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My horse rolls and rubs his head a lot and he has yet to get it off. However the velcro is getting filled with grass and dirt. It seems a bit heavy but my horse adjusted to it quickly and with the help of a treat at the bottom, he willingly sticks his nose into it every morning. It fits fine over his fly mask. I bought the horse size and it fits my Morgan perfectly. He uses pony cheekpieces and a cob noseband, so an average horse might fit better in a large horse size. It is keeping him from grazing down the pasture too fast and of course reducing his waistline. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lukasarts

customer_reviews.title: I really like the headpiece part that keeps the muzzle in place
customer_reviews.text: The grazing muzzle was just as advertised. I really like the headpiece part that keeps the muzzle in place. My horse hated it. She is old, smart and opinionated. The hole to eat through was so small that she couldn't get at any of the grass which upset her a lot. I have never used a grazing muzzle on a horse before so I don't know if the hole they eat through is so small on all of them but after a week, I gave up because she didn't even want to be caught to go out anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Muzzle and horse doesn't mind it
customer_reviews.text: I like this muzzle because my horse doesn't feel trapped in it like others I've tried which made him panic. It also has a slightly larger square hole at the bottom so he can get some grass. Other grazing muzzles are too confining and the holes are too small. The straps are easy to adjust and it has velcro on the side instead of the easy clasp which was what my horse used to get out of all of the time. Came in every morning without the muzzle..... so this one is an improvement. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: SusanLibby

customer_reviews.title: Less Stress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used another brand of muzzle and my horse would looked stressed and I could hear him breathing. I would cut the mesh to make bigger air holes which ruined the integrity of the mask. I've been using this one for a week and a half and it is staying on and my horse is tolerating it very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not pleased with that
customer_reviews.text: my mule has worn the hole to twice the original size in 2 months. I am not pleased with that. I do like the double velcro closure as she has not been able to get it off and while one side of the velcro may get peeled back and full of grass and dirt, the other side holds it in place and it stays on. It is the first time she has had to wear a grazing muzzle, she wears it for about 8-10hrs a day, and I am hoping that she was rough on it while learning how to use it. I will have to get another one and hope it lasts longer than this one.
customer_reviews.author: PTcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good Design but Not Well Made - Broke Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Good design - my horse wasn't able to get out of it without breaking it. Bad construction - in about a week it broke. I thought about having it repaired and some of the seams reinforced, but ALL of the metal fasteners were damaged and one was pulled out completely. My horse doesn't like wearing a muzzle, but I don't know many that really like it. He had been wearing a used one that velcros on to his halter for over a month and that one didn't break, so I don't think it's my horse.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Great grazing muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Great grazing muzzle though they've changed the design somewhat since this picture. It allows my easy keeping Arabian mare to graze out in the pasture with my other 2 horses. It doesn't rub on her head like other muzzles I've used in the past and has been very durable- this is the 3rd one I've purchased. The hole in the muzzle gets bigger after about one grazing season and I have to order a new muzzle because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Waugh

customer_reviews.title: I like the openings for the nostrils
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One is horse size and one is mini size. Both fit well. I like the openings for the nostrils, which enable the horses to breathe better. The horse size does have a strap positioned that goes right across my 15.1hh mare’s nostrils but it does not seem to affect her negatively. I also like that they are breakaway. Does not prevent them from grazing but definitely slows them down!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Sores your horses!
customer_reviews.text: They are tough all right! So tough, they wore holes in my horses in THREE DAYS!!! In the height of fly season, my poor mares have sores on their cheeks, AND noses. Adjustments do not solve the problem---it's in the design. I've used grazing muzzles for 30+ years, and never had this problem!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Winsor

customer_reviews.title: lighter, with more air circulation
customer_reviews.text: The grazing muzzle is lighter weight, wider around the nose and has larger holes in front of the nostrils so it is easier for the horse to breathe. My horse sweats less and is happier.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Never had this problem before
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is well made or so I thought until this morning. It’s been used less than 3 weeks! The Muzzle is coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Donna Young

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the easy breathe muzzle has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. The product was delivered as stated. The quality of the easy breathe muzzle has definitely gone downhill the last few years. This brand-new muzzle already looks like it's been run over by a dump truck, sent through a cement mixer and rubbed on pavement. But all that has happened is that my very docile horse has worn it out in the pasture eating grass. The hole his already enlarged in size, the front has ripped and there is wear showing on all the threads. The easy breathe muzzle has been my favorite in the past, generally lasting at least two seasons. I'm very disappointed that this one hasn't even lasted one month.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Really like it b/c it doesn't rub like others I have bought - I do wish eating hole was smaller.
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle really seems to do well and because of it's large "basket" size, it doesn't rub my horse nearly as bad as the many other muzzles I have purchased and used which would rub raw spots. Hence I think the lack of rubbing really is what makes it better than the others! Naturally the larger nostril holes for breathing is also good although my horses seemed to breathe just fine with the other muzzles. It seems quite durable too. I do agree with the other reviewers that the eating hole is large, and so I wish that was a bit smaller to further restrict eating.
customer_reviews.author: Gave it a try

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well enough. I get about 3 months of daily usage. I like that it slows the consumption without stopping it. It’s a bit pricy, but welcome to horses
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This muzzle depends on each as to the fit is  ery well made
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle was to big was well made but concern that my horse would be able to slip out of it in pasture have previously purchased same muzzle that Ttaches to halter and is easier to adjust my horse is large quarterhorse and still to big for her
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Probably would not buy again until it is tweeked.
customer_reviews.text: I have used several brands of muzzles, some much more expensive...I love the idea of the large air holes in this muzzle but my horse quickly figured out how to eat through them. I had to rig it in place with strings in the front to hold it in place. This muzzle just needs a few tweeks to be perfect. Also, the triangle hole in the bottom is twice as big as the round hole other muzzles so not so sure it is restricting as much grass....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but he does seem to be able to breathe with it and even get a few nibbles of grass to keep him from being bored and unhappy stan
customer_reviews.text: My horse may not be entirely thrilled with this muzzle, but he does seem to be able to breathe with it and even get a few nibbles of grass to keep him from being bored and unhappy standing in a field of grass which he cannot eat. He leads well by the ring at the bottom (although I would not want to test it in an emergency situation), and it has not come off accidentally. It seems comfortable for my horse, and is easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Fanwillow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father in law who ponies his 2 year old gelding on trail rides. Apparently the 2 year old constantly tries to nip the lead horse on the rump causing issues. He is over the moon with this muzzle. Says its great quality & keeps the young horse from causing problems.
customer_reviews.author: Azcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I just loved to Kentucky from California and was worried about my mare being out on grass. She’s been getting turned out for a few hours at night with the grazing muzzle for over a month and is doing well. She does have s few rub marks on her face, but that’s expected. It’s holding up fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Had a larger opening and does not restrict breathing. My mare was able to get it off though. She would roll around rubbing her head against the ground until she had it off. I had to get creative and eventually I got it to stay on and she started losing some pounds
customer_reviews.author: Tayloranne 13

customer_reviews.title: No Trauma to Horse or Owner
customer_reviews.text: This grazing muzzle saved the day for my chubby Haffie who gains weight looking at grass. He doesn't seem to mind it at all. Gives him the freedom to roam around the pasture versus being in a stall or dry lot. I was concerned that he wouldn't drink as much but no problem there either. I like that it has several areas for adjustment to get a comfortable fit. I purchased the horse size and it is just right. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grazing mask on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best grazing mask I ever bought and I have gone through 7 over 12 years. My haflinger doesn’t try to get this one off. Fits really
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time that I have ordered and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have ordered and used these grazing masks. They have lasted two years. Generally they are durable and fit well. My only complaint is that they are fixed with velcro and my donkeys have been able to pull that apart by scratching on a post. To keep them one the animals, I have found that I have to use duct tape over the velcro closure. I think a buckle would be more effective.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stout

customer_reviews.title: best muzzle
customer_reviews.text: this is simply the best muzzle on the market. My horse keeps it on and is comfortable. The muzzle arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: michael lerner

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the hard muzzles
customer_reviews.text: Last year I used a hard plastic muzzle for my mare, and even with a fur lining it cut her "chin" up pretty bad. I went for a softer muzzle this year and so far so good. She's been wearing it about two weeks now and I'm happy with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tauber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to custom fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Arab mare and at first I thought it might be too big, but she adjusted well to it. At the same time I purchased a pony size muzzle for my Shetland who has a big head. I almost thought he would need the horse and vice versa but I kept adjusting them and got a good fit. I like all the straps that allow a good custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: aunt mimi

customer_reviews.title: Minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part these muzzles have worked well. There are a couple of issues that could be improved. The Velcro fasteners are easy for the horse to rub open. The rubber bottom could be stronger. My mare has bitten a portion off of it. Also advise buyers that the muzzle can rub sore spots on the horses. Mine got them on their upper cheeks, chins, and jaw bones. These are minor issues, all in all, they have worked well at keeping weight off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is excellent! Holding up well, generous holes at the nostrils allow for more than adequate room for nostrils to move which is very important when its hot! Hole for allowing grass to come thru is just right, lets enough grass in to encourage horse to keep trying, but not so much that you can't tell she's wearing it. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Donnarumma

customer_reviews.title: Headstall part runs small
customer_reviews.text: First time to use a grazing muzzle and I picked this one after looking at many online. It is adjustable and well made. However it seems to run small. My quarter horse is on the smaller side with a refined head. It fits but is at the largest adjustment. If your horse is bigger or even average size, this would be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grazing Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Our first experience with grazing muzzles and we lucked out and purchased the best grazing muzzle ever. No rubs or chafing. My uber sensitive diva horse has been in it for 10 to 12 hours a day, 7 days a week all summer and never a problem. Thank you Tough One for making a product that is comfortable for my boy😊 This has literally saved his life and has allowed him to continue being a herd member rather than being stuck in a dry paddock for the rest of his life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one has a metal snap not a plastic one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best design I have ever purchased. Not plastic snaps that always break before the basket wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be of good quality, but I suggest purchasing 1 size bigger than you normally would think to. My Quarter Horse has usually wore a cob sized at it's fullest or a horse size at its tightest. I ordered a horse sized muzzle and it barely fits.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Great for horses with Cushing’s or are prone to founder
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly to keep my older horse on the move all day long, exercising and keeping her weight in check. Great for horses with Cushing’s or are prone to founder.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters performance horse. He likes his grass and even though she rides him on a daily bases he would still be over weight. We used the grazing muzzles last year and it worked well. A family member ordered this one and loved it. I liked the easy breathe holes so I ordered one. This muzzle works great it is a little bigger then the tough 1 I purchased at the local tack store and the Velcro is much longer. When buying a muzzle make sure to have plenty of adjustment to lengthen. I really think the horse is comfortable in this one too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not doing the job
customer_reviews.text: While my horse has only had this on for two days I am disappointed in the fact that he keeps getting the muzzle off his nose. It seems to be a little more shallow than others and therefore he is able to slip it off and keep eating. Construction of this muzzle is good quality but I feel I may have to replace it with then old style.
customer_reviews.author: Jdsila

customer_reviews.title: The horse is comfortable with it on except he is not happy that ...
customer_reviews.text: My horse that tends to be overweight is down in weight since using this muzzle. It only came off once and I think the snap was not done. The horse is comfortable with it on except he is not happy that he can't over eat like normal when on pasture. No one likes to diet.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gottsacker

customer_reviews.title: Sizing changes ?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. Unfortunately I did have to send it back for a larger size even though I had ordered the same size as before. I don't know if they changed their sizing but I did notice the Velcro straps were much shorter so weren't quite as versatile. That being said it is a great muzzle and my horse is quite happy to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: noodle22

customer_reviews.title: Great for the horse to breathe easier than a standard ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the horse to breathe easier than a standard grazing muzzle but my horse wore it for 2 days (about 8-10 hours a day) and the side of the muzzle has already detached from halter part. Poor design and my horse is not hard on these. Don't recommend for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a gracing muzzle that is not heavy and hot!
customer_reviews.text: It is so much better than any we have ever had. I hate to make him wear one but he is insulin resistant so with this he does not have to stand in a dry lot. It is not hot, and he can breathe easily. It cuts his grass consumption by about 50% or more.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Rectangle opening for horse to eat. Break away if gets hung up. Nostril openings are larger for easy breathing and air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love this style of grazing muzzle the horse was less ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of grazing muzzle the horse was less than happy to see a new one though. Our first one held up well (at least 2 years) until our "puppy" got a hold of it and chewed it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heffer pony protection
customer_reviews.text: My pony goes through a muzzle a year as he often wears his 24/7. I give him supplements and his one supplement stinks and gets absorbed into the muzzle so I don't mind an annual replacement. I normally top the muzzle with a removable fuzzy since the pony was getting a mild rub.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Within 1 hour of putting it on, my pony ...
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 hour of putting it on, my pony had torn two of the rivets loose and managed to get the muzzle off her nose. I've tightened the straps, so hopefully that will help, but I'm not impressed that a bit of rubbing would pop two rivets.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good grazing muzzle
customer_reviews.text: It does allow easier breathing, but also has a larger eating hole than most others so that must be taken into account. I like these and am on my 6th one since my girl wears hers 24/7/365 and slowly chews out the eating hole until I have to replace it. I have never had any problems with rubbing or discomfort. I will continue to buy them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Packan

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for grazing. Kept my mate from cribbing too until she broke it. It also rubbed the side of her head and wore off hair and made the area sore.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The muzzle is well constructed and has not rubbed any ...
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle is well constructed and has not rubbed any sores beyond making the horse's muzzle bare. She doesn't think too much of it, but it does the trick. She will put her head into it on her own though which is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too restrictive to allow ANY grazing and too snug on the horse's muzzle. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: GiddyYuppy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, no rubs
customer_reviews.text: We love these muzzles. After using the heavier ones for years and covering them in fleece these don't rub. Our horses did wear through the bottom in about a month so we took a replacement insert for another brand and cut it to fit. This extends the life somewhat but each horse went through 2 muzzles this summer. Would still buy again because we hate the struggle with face rubs. These are also very light and we found the holes to be a sufficient size.
customer_reviews.author: jstrayer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs and the pony I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs and the pony I use it on is able to get plenty of fresh air. Recommend this product to anyone! Only change I would love to see is a breakaway leather crown for emergencies
customer_reviews.author: Shari Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting  muzzle
customer_reviews.text: This is the only muzzle I can keep on my horse
customer_reviews.author: K. Greiss

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, plenty of room to breathe....my Hafflinger and Icelandic are in the horse size, they aren't thrilled with the muzzles but are happy to be out with the others. I recommend this instead of the traditional grazing muzzles.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I have used many and this has ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I was sad to see the cob size was dropped from your inventory. I have Arabians and the horse size is just to big. So I had to improvise to keep it on him. Will have to go elsewhere next time I purchase a muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nice company
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. It was just large for my horse. Dealing with this company is very positive.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Grazing Muzzle/Stop Cribbing
customer_reviews.text: My horse has a cribbing issue so not only is this good for grazing control but also a excellent way to stop his cribbing while out in the pasture. I would not put it on in the stall for fear of it getting hung up on something.
customer_reviews.author: Barara M. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ... I bought another for someone else & they were wowed by the construction & how quickly their horse adapted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dasher

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY small! The "horse size" wouldn't even fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs VERY small! The "horse size" wouldn't even fit my friend's mare who wears "cob" in everything. Re-ordered in the larger size, but oversized barely fit the normal horses in our barn.
customer_reviews.author: KTM

customer_reviews.title: Grazing Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: My horse has this grazing muzzle off within 10 minutes. I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Throatlatch too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "horse" size for my Quarter Horse who has the smallest possible head--hard to fit for bridles, halters, etc. The throatlatch strap is not long enough to actually snap closed on the ring. It adjusts large enough over the crown/poll but the throatlatch is ~3 inches too short at it's longest setting. Very disappointing for ~$30.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah Scheibinger

customer_reviews.title: This is the best muzzle out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best muzzle out there! Tough, durable design is well thought out. My horse accepted this muzzle the best out of 3 different designs that were tried. My only complaint is that the actual muzzle circumference seems to run a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Avery

customer_reviews.title: Returning muzzle
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Horse size grazing muzzle for my horse who always wears a Cobb bridle and muzzle. I had to adjust the Velcro strap as long as it would go, and it was still almost too short. He went out to pasture for 2 hours and came back with his nose rubbed raw and bloody! This muzzle is being returned...
customer_reviews.author: Marte

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting and comfortable for the horse
customer_reviews.text: Love the newer design that makes it more comfortable and easier to breathe through for the horse. Happy with it so far and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: lyssa9806

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old design better. Much more open. I was disappointed when I received the new one I ordered and realized the design had changed. Plus there is not as much adjustability as the old model. I have a Morgan with a petite head and I had to let out the straps almost as far as they would go. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. My mare has lost her weight and actually puts her head down so I can put it on. I have put a soft piece of felt under her chin so she doesn't get a sore. She is also able to breath easily
customer_reviews.author: Joan Staubach

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these and my horse has managed to break them both very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Definately helps easy keepers lose weight.
customer_reviews.text: Has helped my fat easy keeper lose weight. It stays on and he does great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grazing muzzel
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with this muzzel is that my gelding hooked it on the fence and it pulled apart at the rivets instead of the velcro head band as it was designed to do. In my opinion, less velcro would be the answer to this problem. The muzzel is now unuseable but the company sent me a new one when I contacted them and explained what had happened. They were very helpful and interested in how it could be improved. It did it's job in that it did break away, just not so that it was able to be used again.
customer_reviews.author: silverandgold

customer_reviews.title: easy breath Grazing muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight but hole is a little large works well but not if you want to limit eating a lot
customer_reviews.author: j rausa

customer_reviews.title: Horses figured it out pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.text: One horse got a minor rub, but worth it to give some pasture freedom!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: The muzzle is of decent quality. However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle is of decent quality. However, the Chinese kid making this has never seen a horse. The throat latch is 5" too short for any horse.
customer_reviews.author: dodgecummins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transaction. Item as described and fast shipping. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good muzzle, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Good muzzle, fit well, just not as sturdy as I would have liked. It only held up for about a year and a half before it got torn to shreds.
customer_reviews.author: LegolasArod

customer_reviews.title: Is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the six weeks it held up. The straps were ripped off the muzzle. Is there any kind of warranty?
customer_reviews.author: SHM

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this muzzle seems much sturdier and stronger than other muzzles I've used, looks like it will last longer. No rubbing on the nose with 24 hour use
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breather grazing muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Its not as heavy duty as the best friend grazing muzzle but it allows more breathing room - it also allows more grass but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Little Pecan

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received the grazing muzzle very pormptly, was just as it was described; quality looking product. Have only used it a couple of times but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Tough 1 Easy Breathe muzzle. The one last year was designed a little bit different. I made sure to order the exact same one/size again, but this year's edition looks different. They used metal buckle/sliders instead of plastic which I like, but the velcro straps are less than half the length they used to be and overall the regular horse size now runs very very small, even too small for a cob. Very disappointed, I would have to order the "large horse" one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best muzzle out there. i prefer the neon orange color tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality but did not fit my average sized horse. Would fit a Cob/Arab or large pony
customer_reviews.author: shannon callahan

customer_reviews.title: You can breathe easier too!
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is very durable at a great price. I love the large openings that allow more air flow than most muzzles on the market. My horse can't wait to get it on to go outside!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rock

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I don't worry as much in the hot
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I don't worry as much in the hot weather
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Buckles not very good
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the plastic buckles were pointless. First day my mare ripped them off on something. Had to take muzzle to harness shop for repair. I was less than satisfied with the quality because of that. After repair with "real" buckles it has worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wright

customer_reviews.title: I really like that it has bigger opening for the horses nostrils ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it has bigger opening for the horses nostrils and also a bigger opening in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: velcro
customer_reviews.text: i liked it but my horse got it off in pasteur after 3 days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this muzzle
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this muzzle. It is sturdy and I really like the openings for my mare's nostrils.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: I used this on my horse every day from May ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my horse every day from May to July to restrict his grass intake since he is overweight. It held up well and he tolerated it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: High Mountain Rider

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the larger nose holes and my horse doesn't mind wearing this one. Easy on and off is a extra added perk.
customer_reviews.author: s. o

customer_reviews.title: What a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of horses that are close to foundering, so now they are able to graze with the rest of the herd.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Cangemi

customer_reviews.title: My horse does not like it but I have not really given him long ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just as described. My horse does not like it but I have not really given him long enough to wear it yet. My farrier said he has seen several horses wearing them and they learn to use it well. I'll see!!
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle has worked very well. My horse has been wearing for 2 weeks now and it has not rubbed or been lost in the pasture. The velco makes it for a safe breakaway if he gets tangled. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sine

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: I found the basket on this muzzle was too short and wide at the top. I couldn't adjust it enough to fit my average size mare. She was able to get it off as soon as she was out of the barn. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah T

customer_reviews.title: ... and allows for my horse to breathe so much better than the other kinds that I have used
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is light weight and allows for my horse to breathe so much better than the other kinds that I have used. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: horseherd5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My horse is much more comfortable with this one than the other type.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Lupo

customer_reviews.title: this muzzle has held up well-ive had it over a ...
customer_reviews.text: this muzzle has held up well-ive had it over a year now and will need it again this spring, it didnt rub and works as its supposed too
customer_reviews.author: pancheula

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have had to use muzzles for years on my two fatties and this one is the best I've used so far. Love that it is better for their breathing then some of the other ones I've tried that seem to cover so much of their face.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Tough 1 Easy breath Grazing muzzle
customer_reviews.text: It is nicer then the other grazing muzzles I have tried due to the large opening by the nose. Wish it had a little more adjustment for fit. My horse does not mind it he eats and drinks just fine through it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

product_meta.title: Tough-1 Easy Breathe Grazing Muzzle
product_meta.description: Size:HorseHorse Size / Full Size - Poly/nylon web halter/muzzle all in one combination for controlling over eating by limiting intake through the small opening at the bottom of the muzzle. Large holes in front for easy breathing. Adjustable nylon halter with throat snap. Black.
feature_bullets: Used to limit the intake of grass
Adjustable nylon halter with throat snap and ring
Featuring large holes in front for easy breathing
Choose form the available size options
